## Biography

Carlos Simms is a Mexican-American, first-generation alumnus from the University of Idaho. He was a Ronald E. McNair Scholar and graduated in December of 2019. His academic accreditation from the institution included a Bachelor of Science in Environmental Social Science and an academic certificate in Climate Change. Carlos is now pursuing a Master of Science in Environmental Science and Management at the University of California at Santa Barbara, emphasizing his studies in energy and climate. Carlos aspires to one day be a data scientist and/or an energy and climate specialist for corporate America and/or the renewable energy industry.
